label: 天神経
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: [The Tenjin sutra] was only a few lines long and invoked Tenjin's name in language mimicking that of a Buddhist sutra.  The text was read upon concluding the Tenjin Lectures" (Tenjinkō) service (p. 330). [天神講] "
